text: @realDonaldTrump Wow. The drug has been around for 60 years and apparently is tried and true, in treating malaria. Yet some nut jobs, are afraid to try it on covid-19 patients that are about to die (especially with so many dying as it is). Why more  dangerous for COVID-19 patients, any way?
